message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the financial statement.

Looking at the income statement, I can see that there is a "Cost of Goods Sold" line item which typically represents the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the period.

From the income statement:
| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Cost of Goods Sold | 562950.00 | 2024-02-01 |

This line item represents the value of inventory that was sold during the reporting period.

Therefore, the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period is 562950.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '562950.00'} }
```
